member.name: D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies how the pipeline interprets geometry or hull shader input primitives.

member.name: D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE.D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE_UNDEFINED
member.summary: The shader has not been initialized with an input primitive type.

member.name: D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE.D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE_POINT
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a point.

member.name: D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE.D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE_LINE
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a line.

member.name: D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE.D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE_TRIANGLE
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a triangle.

member.name: D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE.D3D12_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TYPE_PATCH
member.summary: Interpret the input primitive as a control point patch.
